[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [VARIABLE\_CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.variable_category_name_variable.md)

## VARIABLE\_CATEGORY\_NAME variable

String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with variable blocks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
VARIABLE_CATEGORY_NAME: string
```
